Docs.summary: Represents information about a SOAP fault that is specified in a <xref:System.ServiceModel.FaultContractAttribute> attribute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks You can get a collection of FaultContractInfo objects by accessing the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ClientOperation.FaultContractInfos%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.DispatchOperation.FaultContractInfos%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties. The FaultContractInfo class exposes the action of the SOAP fault and the detail type that is serialized into the SOAP fault.
